messages.msgSnippet: -=- I am thinking of driving over to Sacramento for a day and hearing you speak. For a new unschooler what day would you recommend that I come (since you know
messages.messageBody:
-=-
I am thinking of driving over to Sacramento for a day and hearing you
speak. For a new unschooler what day would you recommend that I come
(since
you know your speaking schedule.. bwg). It will probably just be me
coming
since I'm saving extra money for attending Life is Good or Live and
Learn
(or both) in 2008.-=-

Friday there's a general unschooling discussion, but the time is not
yet determined.

Sunday morning there are two talks in a row, from 9:00 to noon (not
in the same room, but one after the other).

I don't know which day would be better otherwise.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: news of me
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I am thinking of driving over to Sacramento for a day and hearing you speak.  For a new unschooler what day would you recommend that I come (since you
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,

I am thinking of driving over to Sacramento for a day and hearing you
speak. For a new unschooler what day would you recommend that I come (since
you know your speaking schedule.. bwg). It will probably just be me coming
since I'm saving extra money for attending Life is Good or Live and Learn
(or both) in 2008.

Thanks!
Erica

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] news of me
messages.msgSnippet: I love the picture of you and Keith!! BB, Chrissie Sandra Dodd  wrote: I feel like Miss Piggy, reporting on *moi,* but today it can t be
messages.messageBody:
I love the picture of you and Keith!!

BB,
Chrissie

Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
I feel like Miss Piggy, reporting on *moi,* but today it can't be
helped! <g>

I have my contract for speaking at the HSC conference and so that's a
go. August 16-19, Sacramento
http://hscconference.com/index.html

The speaker intros makes it seem I'll only be there Sunday, but
they're going to change that, I think. I'm keynote speaker on
Sunday, but I'm speaking Friday too, and doing a music workshop
(singing) Saturday.

And there's some up to the moment news (and history, photo of me and
Keith from 27 years ago or so) here:
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com

and a request for advice on which photo of my kids should go into the
Live and Learn conference brochure. They can't decide.

Thanks,

Sandra





"All you have to decide is what to do with the time you have been given." Gandalf

---------------------------------
Food fight? Enjoy some healthy debate
in the Yahoo! Answers Food & Drink Q&A.

messages.subject: news of me
messages.msgSnippet: I feel like Miss Piggy, reporting on *moi,* but today it can t be helped!  I have my contract for speaking at the HSC conference and so that s a go.  August
messages.messageBody:
I feel like Miss Piggy, reporting on *moi,* but today it can't be
helped! <g>

I have my contract for speaking at the HSC conference and so that's a
go. August 16-19, Sacramento
http://hscconference.com/index.html

The speaker intros makes it seem I'll only be there Sunday, but
they're going to change that, I think. I'm keynote speaker on
Sunday, but I'm speaking Friday too, and doing a music workshop
(singing) Saturday.

And there's some up to the moment news (and history, photo of me and
Keith from 27 years ago or so) here:
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com

and a request for advice on which photo of my kids should go into the
Live and Learn conference brochure. They can't decide.

Thanks,

Sandra
